Insurance for acupuncture treatments are accepted [Get Your Insurance Verified](https://www.drmicahallen.com/insurance-verification-form) before [Scheduling Your Appointment Today!](https://www.schedulicity.com/scheduling/ENHEQF) Acupuncture and Chinese Herbal Medicine can be used to help treat and manage: Acupuncture is a technique involving the insertion of fine needles into the skin at specific acupuncture points. Traditional Chinese Medicine (TCM) dates back as far as 5,000 years. The foundation of TCM is Acupuncture meridians and Chinese Herbal Medicine. There are the basic 365 mapped acupuncture points along the 12 major and eight extra meridians as well as over 1,000 extra points including micro-systems such as the hand, ear, and scalp, all with very specialized functions.
